## isRemirrorProvider variable

Finds if this is a RemirrorProvider (which provides the RemirrorInjectedProps into the context);

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isRemirrorProvider: <GOptions extends {} = any>(value: unknown) => value is RemirrorElement<GOptions>
```
